name: Tarek
description:
Tarek – an unusual puzzle platformer in which you have to move objects to connect three in a row and get points.

Feature of game
  • Minimalism - the whole thrill of the game is in logic and speed
  • Ability to move objects
  • Keys, switches and levers
  • A lot of interesting quests
  • Three-in-a-row puzzles
  • Collecting coins
